text:
#Chloroquine (various versions) has been in use in India since the 1950's as a treatment for lupus and as a preventative for malaria, it is even safe for pregnant women.  

It costs a penny a pill (8 Rupees for 10). 
USA Pharma HATE this drug - they cant make profit on it. https://t.co/Pj1z9Nb9x5
